content.text: You can test your HTML skills with W3Schools' Quiz.

The test contains 40 questions and there is no time
limit.

The test is not official, it's just a nice way to see how much you know,
or don't know, about HTML.

You will get 1 point for
each correct answer. At the end of the Quiz, your total score will be displayed.
Maximum score is 40 points.

Start the Quiz
Good luck!
Start the HTML Quiz ❯
If you don't know HTML, we suggest that you read our HTML Tutorial from scratch.

★
